thread.section_title: BoxyMo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BoxyMo | www.boxymo.ie | 3 of 19
thread.title: Jeff Rockett

author: Jeff Rockett
title: Jeff Rockett
text: This is my second year with Boxymo and I would recommend them to any young or first time driver. The no frills self service approach represents great value for money and the telematics box offers peace of mind and encourages safe driving. Once you understand this is not the typical insurance company with apps and call centres, you'll get on just fine. Love getting my monthly score and weekly texts too to remind me how I'm doing.
